tool.name: Fpocket

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the PDB structure where the binding site is to be found. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: outname_output_pockets_zip
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: Path to all the pockets found by fpocket in the input_pdb_path structure Format: [output].zip

param.name: outname_output_summary
param.label: output JSON name
param.help: Path to the JSON summary file Format: [output].json

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: num_spheres
param.label: num_spheres
param.help: Indicates how many alpha spheres a pocket must contain at least in order to figure in the results.

param.name: sort_by
param.label: sort_by
param.help: From which property the output will be sorted.

param.name: fpocket_path
param.label: fpocket_path
param.help: path to fpocket in your local computer.
